content:
IHE Youtube video, https://youtu.be/3sDgnS71m4o.

Covering topics of:

  • Document Sharing (concept, XDS, XCA, MHDS)
  • FHIR access to Documents
  • MHD as API to classic XDS or XCA or XDR
  • Support profiles: IUA, PDQm, PIXm, mCDS, …
  • MHDS as a full FHIR stack solution
  • Support profiles also include PMIR, SVCM
  • Consuming Elements/Resources (mXDE + QEDm)
  • Add Provenance – to get back to source documents

IHE just published an update to their HIE-Whitepaper that includes the FHIR support profiles. This paper covers the same scope as the presentation, with deeper and more comprehensive details. This HIE-Whitepaper includes links to the specifications too, so it is a good way to be introduced and go deep.
https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/HIE-Whitepaper/index.html
This is open for public comment until January 15th.
Reminder Public Comment is open until January 15th
